label: A2BC_oP16_62_2c_c_c-004
title: SrZnO$_{2}$
comments:
(Schnering, 1961) give the structure in the $Pmnb$ setting of space group \#62.  We used AFLOW to transform this into the standard $Pnma$ setting. The transformation swaps the positions of the $a$- and $b$-axes. 
\href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC_oP16_62_2c_c_c-003}{UMoC$_{2}$} and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC_oP16_62_2c_c_c-004}{SrZnO$_{2}$} have the same AFLOW prototype label, A2BC\_oP16\_62\_2c\_c\_c. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
